function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Difficulty achieving theorization in all service sectors","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited ability for service firms to affect customer demand during a pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation to covid-19 disruptions in the service industry","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of social legitimacy and acceptance of adaptive strategies","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective measures to control virus transmission in service environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Close physical interaction in service industries increases the risk of contagious diseases propagation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to new regulations wearing masks in public leading to increased spread of the disease.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Severe loss of demand and revenues in non-essential services such as entertainment and tourism.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to financial aid and resources for smes, especially in skill development and training.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective economic interventions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective public health policies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restructuring the team based on medical project requirements","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prolonged discussions with doctors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through close individual interactions within service smes.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relocation decisions based on anticipated access requirements of customers may increase the risk of disease spread.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of agility and adaptability in coping with crisis times may lead to increased vulnerability to contagious disease outbreaks.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilizing artificial intelligence and image processing technology for medical diagnosis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Having informal close relationships and provision of reaching them for overcoming potential future financial constraints","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Value co-creation is broadened to the service network to include other stakeholders such as their competitors","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Service smes’ relationship building and process-enabling capabilities are critical for survival and sustainability in disruptive service conditions.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strategic sensitivity is a critical capability for service smes, particularly in anticipation and understanding of pandemic and post-pandemic conditions.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Flexibility in reshaping businesses and empowering other parties to shape the nature or process of service provision is essential for service smes.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Forced closures of service businesses","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High demand for certain services beyond capacity","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to social isolation and increased indoor activities like cooking and baking together with children.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient diagnostic procedures and increased pressure on health-care services.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mutual interaction becoming more vital during the pandemic period","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Psychological burden due to negative experiences during the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty and worry among actors in the service ecosystem","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Encouraging physical activities for children using basic household items may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases if proper hygiene and sanitation measures are not followed","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Idle employees in the real estate business during the pandemic may lead to increased risk of viral transmission if proper safety measures are not followed","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of synchronization in service processes between partners may lead to miscommunication and an increased risk of inefficiency, potentially impacting the delivery of services and public health","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased consumption of unhealthy food due to lifestyle changes during the pandemic.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access to safe and healthy food options.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on eating out and lack of cooking skills among consumers.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Open access classes for children may increase the risk of contagion in the community.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuing indoor activities without appropriate safety measures may lead to a higher risk of contagion.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharing information and interacting closely with competitors may lead to the transmission of contagious diseases if proper precautions are not risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relational interactions during the pandemic","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Nonopportunistic processes between actors risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of customer needs identification","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of latent customer
